i1.name: Royal Privilege
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Qiyana's''' [[basic attack]]s and damaging [[ability|abilities]] deal {{as|{{passive progression/deprecated version|15 to 83}}|physical damage}} {{as|(+ 55% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} to affected enemies.
This effect cannot occur on the same target more than once every few seconds.
''Royal Privilege's'' {{sti|cooldown}} is reset on all targets upon gathering or changing an {{ai|Terrashape|Qiyana|Element}}.
i1.descriptionHtml: Innate: Qiyana's basic attacks and damaging ability deal Unknown value: passive progression/deprecated version 15 to 83 (+ 55% bonus AD) (+ 30% AP) bonus physical damage to affected enemies.This effect cannot occur on the same target more than once every few seconds.Royal Privilege's cooldown is reset on all targets upon gathering or changing an Element.
i1.notes: * {{Pending for test}}: ''Royal Privelege's'' interaction with ''parrying'' effects ({{tip|dodge}}, {{tip|block}}, {{tip|blind}}).

w1.name: Terrashape
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} While holding an ''Element'', '''Qiyana''' gains {{sti|as|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}}, {{sti|range|25 '''bonus''' attack range}}, {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} on her basic attacks and basic abilities, and [[Combat status|out-of-combat]] {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} while moving near the ''Element'' currently being held.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Qiyana''' {{tip|dashes}} towards the target location while gathering an ''Element'' of the nearest {{cci|Terrashape Brush.png}} {{sbc|{{as|Brush}}}}, {{cci|Terrashape River.png}} {{sbc|{{as|River}}}} or {{cci|Terrashape Rock.png}} {{sbc|{{as|Terrain}}}} she targeted, enchanting her blade.
''A target Element is required to cast this ability''.
Once ''Terrashape'' has been learned, '''Qiyana''' is automatically given the {{cci|Terrashape Rock.png}} {{sbc|{{as|Terrain}}}} element upon [[Death|respawning]].
w1.descriptionHtml: Passive: While holding an Element, Qiyana gains bonus attack speed, 25 bonus attack range, bonus magic damage on her basic attacks and basic abilities, and Combat status bonus movement speed while moving near the Element currently being held.Active: Qiyana dashes towards the target location while gathering an Element of the nearest Unknown value: cci Terrashape Brush.png Brush, Unknown value: cci Terrashape River.png River or Unknown value: cci Terrashape Rock.png Terrain she targeted, enchanting her blade.A target Element is required to cast this ability.Once Terrashape has been learned, Qiyana is automatically given the Unknown value: cci Terrashape Rock.png Terrain element upon Death.
w1.notes:
* Terrain created by {{tip|champion|champions}} are not valid target terrain.
* The water puddles formed by the {{ui|Ocean Drake|Ocean Rift}} on {{tip|Summoner's Rift}} count as valid terrain for obtaining the {{cci|Terrashape River.png}} {{sbc|{{as|River}}}} element.
* The {{tip|brush|brushes}} grown by {{cai|Brushmaker|Ivern}} count for gathering the {{cci|Terrashape Brush.png}} {{sbc|{{as|Brush}}}} element.
* '''Qiyana''' can cast any of her abilities during the {{tip|dash}}.

effects.str:
• Bonus Attack Speed: %

  • Bonus Magic Damage: (+ 10% bonus AD) (+ 30% AP)

  • Bonus Movement Speed: %

e1.name: Audacity
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Qiyana''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} a fixed distance towards the target enemy, dealing {{as|physical damage}}.
'''Qiyana''' can cast any of her abilities during ''Audacity''. Casting {{ai|Edge of Ixtal|Qiyana}} during ''Audacity'' will autonomously aim at the dash target.
e1.descriptionHtml: Active: Qiyana dashes a fixed distance towards the target enemy, dealing physical damage.Qiyana can cast any of her abilities during Audacity. Casting Edge of Ixtal during Audacity will autonomously aim at the dash target.
e1.notes:
* ''Audacity'' only damages targets if within 250 range at the end of the dash.
* {{ai|Terrashape|Qiyana}} will interrupt ''Audacity's'' dash.

r1.name: Supreme Display of Talent
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Qiyana''' sends a ''windblast'' in the target direction that {{tip|airborne|knocks back}} enemies struck. The ''windblast'' stops upon hitting {{as|terrain}}.

The ''windblast'' then creates an erupting shockwave across any {{sbc|{{as|River}}}} or {{sbc|{{as|Brush}}}} it passes through, as well as around the borders of {{as|terrain}} it reaches, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemies in its path, with the percentage damage capped against {{tip|monster|monsters}} and {{tip|stun|stunning}} enemies hit for {{passive progression/deprecated version|2|changedisplay=true|type=proximity|1|0.5|0|X}} seconds.
r1.descriptionHtml: Active: Qiyana sends a windblast in the target direction that knocks back enemies struck. The windblast stops upon hitting terrain.The windblast then creates an erupting shockwave across any River or Brush it passes through, as well as around the borders of terrain it reaches, dealing physical damage to enemies in its path, with the percentage damage capped against monsters and stunning enemies hit for Unknown value: passive progression/deprecated version 2 changedisplay=true type=proximity 1 0.5 0 X seconds.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|100 to 240}} {{as|(+ 170% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 10% of target's '''maximum''' health)}}|Capped percentage damage|{{ap|500 to 1000}}}}
r1.notes:
* The windblast needs only to reach near terrain to trigger the terrain shockwave.
* Artificial terrain (e.g, {{cai|Crystallize|Anivia}}, {{cai|Weaver's Wall|Taliyah}}, {{cai|Pillar of Ice|Trundle}}) touching map terrain will be treated as a single piece of terrain, even when bridging two pieces of map terrain together; the shockwave will wrap around all connecting terrain. The shockwave's path is determined once it initially spreads; any expired terrain will be treated as if it were still there.
* {{tip|Projectile|Projectile-intercepting}} effects will block the windblast but not the shockwave.
* ''Supreme Display of Talent'' will cast from wherever '''Qiyana''' is at the end of the cast time.
